definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Did you also notice that my friend, Carlton, has just totally ratted out the male race?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有发现我的朋友卡尔顿刚刚让男人们汗颜呢？

sentences.english: Confucius said quote is not all parents boon, me ashamed and embarrassed for.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子说报不尽是父母恩，我无地自容而且为之汗颜。

definition: to consider oneself as being not as good as the others
ashamed and unable to show one's face
to feel ashamed at being inferior (idiom)
ashamed of being inferior (idiom)/to feel inferior to others
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
to have a whole new level of respect for sb or sth/to sit up and take notice (of sb's improved performance etc)
to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
